testcase.brief: AAA Server SIP CLI test for Cloud3.0
testcase.description: aaa radius-server local STA-auth default-type leap aaa radius-server local db-type library-sip-server primary server 10.155.34.202 aaa radius-server local db-type library-sip-server primary port 6001 aaa radius-server local db-type library-sip-server primary institution-id 123 aaa radius-server local db-type library-sip-server primary separator s aaa radius-server local nas test.aerohive.com shared-key ****** aaa radius-server local port 1812 aaa radius-server local user-group Radius-group aaa radius-server local shared-secret-auto-gen aaa radius-server local library-sip-policy sip1 aaa radius-server local enable aaa mac-format delimiter colon aaa mac-format style no-delimiter aaa mac-format case-sensitivity lower-case aaa ppsk-server auto-save-interval 600

step.name: create.radius.server.sip
step.restapi:
{ "ownerId": ${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "jsonType":"radius-server", "name": "AAA_Radius_Server", "description": "This is a AAA_Radius_Server", "enableAcceptOtherDevsAuthReqs": false, "approvedRadiusClients": [{ "ownerId" : ${owner.id}, "predefined" :false, "sharedSecret":"aerohive", "description" : "This is description", "clientIp" : { "ownerId" : ${owner.id}, "jsonType": "ip", "predefined" : false, "name" : "ApprovedRadiusClients", "description": "This is approvedRadiusClients", "ipAddress" : "10.155.201.53" } }],
"enableExternalUserDirectory":false, "enableLibrarySipServer": true, "enableLocalDatabase": false, "authentication": "TLS", "defaultAuthentication": "TLS", "enableVerifyServerCert": true, "serverKeyPassword": "aerohive", "enableCheckCommonName": false, "enableCheckTls": true, "enableCheckPeap": false, "enableCheckTtls":false,
"caCertificate": { "ownerId" : ${owner.id}, "predefined" : false, "fileName" :"test_file_01", "fileSize" : 426, "fileType":"SELF_GEN_CA", "encrypted" : false, "uploadTime" : 1387903732679, "issuer" :"73d4AQuCKHyClF2KAtVh0ARlD6gN5FzPuspxC2l1", "subject":"0X0sLkaJozxOiPz16S3HZXhxJn04AzD", "expireTime" :"1387903732999" },
"serverCertificate": { "ownerId":${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "fileName": "Test_file", "fileSize": 13076, "fileType": "SELF_GEN_CA", "encrypted": false, "uploadTime":1388088615444, "issuer":"rW3ssznJpG3FbQ3w1Sxhkjr3INdhRZBBdFTJo29JSjdjNQ", "subject":"asldjlskdfj", "expireTime":"1388088615554" }, "serverPrivateKey": {"ownerId" : ${owner.id}, "predefined" : false, "fileName" : "serprivatekey_server", "fileSize" : 9072566, "fileType": "CA", "encrypted" : true, "uploadTime" : 1387942203647, "issuer":"rW3ssznJpG3FbG6tsdZ05Jr80QNzAXR3m", "subject":"aSGaflgmneq4qUjnCvLelV2tEi9mhqFOuff67nu", "expireTime":"1387903732999"},
"librarySip": { "ownerId": ${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "enabled": true, "defaultServer": {"jsonType": "library-sip-server", "ownerId": ${owner.id}, "predefined":false, "name": "Test_library_sip_server", "description":"This is a Test_library_sip_server", "port": 36062, "institutionId":"inssssid", "seprate": "1", "userName": "testuser0111", "password":"aerohive", "serverIp": {"ownerId" : ${owner.id}, "predefined" :false, "jsonType" :"ip_range", "name" :"IpRangeAddressProfile", "description" : "this is IpRangeAddressProfile", "ipAddressFrom":"${accessap.ip3}", "ipAddressTo" : "${accessap.ip4}" },
"accessPolicy": { "jsonType":"library-sip-access-policy", "ownerId": ${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "name": "test_access_policy01", "description":"This is a test_access_policy", "defaultAction":"DENY", "defaultMessage":"defaultmessage", "rules": [{ "ownerId":${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "ruleField": "BL", "operation": 12, "action": "RESTRICT", "message":"message11111", "defaultUserGroup":"@{create.radius.user.group}" }], "defaultUserGroup":"@{create.radius.user.group}" } }, "entries": [{ "ownerId":${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "tags":[], "description": "This is one entries", "server": { "jsonType":"library-sip-server", "ownerId": ${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "name": "Test_server", "description":"This is a server", "port":48664, "institutionId":"institutionid", "seprate": "d", "userName":"testuser003", "password":"aerohive", "serverIp": "@{create.hostname.address.profile}", "accessPolicy": { "jsonType":"library-sip-access-policy", "ownerId":${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "name": "test_access_policy02", "description":"This is a test_access_policy", "defaultAction":"DENY", "defaultMessage":"defaultmessage", "rules": [{ "ownerId":${owner.id}, "predefined": false, "ruleField": "BL", "operation": 12, "action": "RESTRICT", "message":"message11111", "defaultUserGroup":"@{create.radius.user.group}" }], "defaultUserGroup": "@{create.radius.user.group}" } } }] } }
